title: Huipil, 1901–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: compound weave, embroidered
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 60.4 x 77.5 cm (23 3/4 x 30 1/2 in.)
description: Design in purple, red, black, green, yellow and blue in extra wefts, almost completely concealing the white ground fabric. The predominant pattern is geometric, especially a zigzag motif in horizontal registers. Lower border has stylized floral forms brocaded and some elements of the design appear to have outlining that is embroidery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Huipil, 1901–50. Medium: cotton
Technique: compound weave, embroidered. 1942-86-101.
